definitions.text: the accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities
the content of direct observation or participation in an event

examples: that painful experience certainly got our attention
We had many trials to go through
he saw action in Viet Nam

definitions.text: have firsthand knowledge of states, situations, emotions, or sensations
examples: I have lived a kind of hell when I was a drug addict
The holocaust survivors have lived a nightmare

definitions.text: go through (mental or physical states or experiences)
undergo an emotional sensation or be in a particular state of mind

examples: The stocks had a fast run-up
